name: PagerDuty
description: Integrate with PagerDuty to list, create, acknowledge and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Incidents
tools.description: List incidents from PagerDuty. Optionally filter by status, urgency, or service.

tools.name: Create Incident
tools.description: Create a new incident in PagerDuty. Requires a title and service ID.

tools.name: Acknowledge Incident
tools.description: Acknowledge one or more PagerDuty incidents. Changes the status from "triggered" to "acknowledged".

tools.name: Resolve Incident
tools.description: Resolve one or more PagerDuty incidents. Changes the status to "resolved".

tools.name: List Services
tools.description: List services from PagerDuty. Returns service names, statuses, and escalation policies.
